name: Farmer Seth
description:
My submission for the Mini-Jam 110!

This Jam followed a theme of 'Sacrifice' with a 'limitation of 'Failure is Inevitable'

In this game you play as a Farmer named Seth, who has been tasked by the underworld to sacrifice his animals to satisfy their hunger. Days continue but the horde continue to require more animals to feast upon and begin attacking Seth for not sacrificing enough of his livestock. 

Try to survive for as many days as possible whilst the horde increases in size. Reach a high number of animal sacrifices to reduce the number of devils that appear! Catching the mythical Billy Goat is worth 3 so keep your eyes out!

Leave a comment with your feedback and the number of days you survived and this page will update to show the highest scores!

Unfortunately I had run out of time to get music and sfx working. However, if this game shows some promise I will update with audio fixes.

Thanks so much for playing!

Name:Days Survived:Sacrifice Highscore:SchtarrLord513
